verses.verse: ( The Lamb Takes the Scroll) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then εἶδον <WG3708> eidon I saw ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi in τὴν <WG3588> tēn the δεξιὰν <WG1188> dexian right hand τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the [One] καθημένου <WG2521> kathēmenou seated ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τοῦ <WG3588> tou the θρόνου <WG2362> thronou throne . βιβλίον <WG975> biblion a scroll γεγραμμένον <WG1125> gegrammenon It had writing ἔσωθεν <WG2081> esōthen on both sides καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . ὄπισθεν <WG3693> opisthen . . . κατεσφραγισμένον <WG2696> katesphragismenon [and was] sealed σφραγῖσιν <WG4973> sphragisin seals . ἑπτά <WG2033> hepta with seven

καὶ <WG2532> kai And εἶδον <WG3708> eidon I saw ἄγγελον <WG32> angelon angel ἰσχυρὸν <WG2478> ischyron a mighty κηρύσσοντα <WG2784> kēryssonta proclaiming ἐν <WG1722> en in φωνῇ <WG5456> phōnē voice , μεγάλῃ <WG3173> megalē a loud Τίς <WG5101> Tis “ Who is ἄξιος <WG514> axios worthy ἀνοῖξαι <WG455> anoixai open τὸ <WG3588> to the βιβλίον <WG975> biblion scroll ? ” καὶ <WG2532> kai and λῦσαι <WG3089> lysai to break τὰς <WG3588> tas - σφραγῖδας <WG4973> sphragidas seals αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou the

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai [But] οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis no one ἐδύνατο <WG1410> edynato was able ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - οὐρανῷ <WG3772> ouranō heaven οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude [or] ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τῆς <WG3588> tēs - γῆς <WG1093> gēs earth οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude [or] ὑποκάτω <WG5270> hypokatō under τῆς <WG3588> tēs the γῆς <WG1093> gēs earth ἀνοῖξαι <WG455> anoixai to open τὸ <WG3588> to the βιβλίον <WG975> biblion scroll οὔτε <WG3777> oute [or] βλέπειν <WG991> blepein look inside αὐτό <WG846> auto it .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ‹ἐγὼ› <WG1473> egō I ἔκλαιον <WG2799> eklaion began to weep πολὺ <WG4183> poly bitterly , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis no one ἄξιος <WG514> axios worthy εὑρέθη <WG2147> heurethē was found ἀνοῖξαι <WG455> anoixai to open τὸ <WG3588> to the βιβλίον <WG975> biblion scroll οὔτε <WG3777> oute [or] βλέπειν <WG991> blepein look inside αὐτό <WG846> auto it .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then εἷς <WG1520> heis one ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τῶν <WG3588> tōn the πρεσβυτέρων <WG4245> presbyterōn elders λέγει <WG3004> legei said μοι <WG1473> moi to me , Μὴ <WG3361> Mē “ Do not κλαῖε <WG2799> klaie weep ! ἰδοὺ <WG2400> idou Behold , ἐνίκησεν <WG3528> enikēsen has triumphed ὁ <WG3588> ho the Λέων <WG3023> Leōn Lion ὁ <WG3588> ho - ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τῆς <WG3588> tēs the φυλῆς <WG5443> phylēs tribe Ἰούδα <WG2448> Iouda of Judah , ἡ <WG3588> hē the Ῥίζα <WG4491> Rhiza Root Δαυίδ <WG1138> Dauid of David , ἀνοῖξαι <WG455> anoixai to open τὸ <WG3588> to the βιβλίον <WG975> biblion scroll καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰς <WG3588> tas - ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven σφραγῖδας <WG4973> sphragidas seals . ” αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou its

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then εἶδον <WG3708> eidon I saw ἐν <WG1722> en in μέσῳ <WG3319> mesō [the] center τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the θρόνου <WG2362> thronou throne , καὶ <WG2532> kai - τῶν <WG3588> tōn [encircled by] the τεσσάρων <WG5064> tessarōn four ζῴων <WG2226> zōōn living creatures καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐν <WG1722> en - μέσῳ <WG3319> mesō - τῶν <WG3588> tōn the πρεσβυτέρων <WG4245> presbyterōn elders . Ἀρνίον <WG721> Arnion a Lamb ἑστηκὸς <WG2476> hestēkos standing ὡς <WG5613> hōs who appeared ἐσφαγμένον <WG4969> esphagmenon to have been slain , ἔχων <WG2192> echōn [The Lamb] had κέρατα <WG2768> kerata horns ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὀφθαλμοὺς <WG3788> ophthalmous eyes , ἑπτά <WG2033> hepta seven οἵ <WG3739> hoi which εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin represent τὰ <WG3588> ta the ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven Πνεύματα <WG4151> Pneumata Spirits ( Or the sevenfold Spirit) τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God ἀπεσταλμένοι <WG649> apestalmenoi sent out εἰς <WG1519> eis into πᾶσαν <WG3956> pasan all τὴν <WG3588> tēn the γῆν <WG1093> gēn earth .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen He came καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἴληφεν <WG2983> eilēphen took [the scroll] ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τῆς <WG3588> tēs the δεξιᾶς <WG1188> dexias right hand τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the [One] καθημένου <WG2521> kathēmenou seated ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τοῦ <WG3588> tou the θρόνου <WG2362> thronou throne .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ὅτε <WG3753> hote When ἔλαβεν <WG2983> elaben He had taken τὸ <WG3588> to the βιβλίον <WG975> biblion scroll , τὰ <WG3588> ta the τέσσαρα <WG5064> tessara four ζῷα <WG2226> zōa living creatures καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi the εἴκοσι <WG1501> eikosi twenty-four τέσσαρες <WG5064> tessares . . . πρεσβύτεροι <WG4245> presbyteroi elders ἔπεσαν <WG4098> epesan fell down ἐνώπιον <WG1799> enōpion before τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Ἀρνίου <WG721> Arniou Lamb . ἔχοντες <WG2192> echontes had ἕκαστος <WG1538> hekastos Each one κιθάραν <WG2788> kitharan a harp , καὶ <WG2532> kai and they were holding φιάλας <WG5357> phialas bowls χρυσᾶς <WG5552> chrysas golden γεμούσας <WG1073> gemousas full θυμιαμάτων <WG2368> thymiamatōn of incense , αἵ <WG3739> hai which εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin are αἱ <WG3588> hai the προσευχαὶ <WG4335> proseuchai prayers τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the ἁγίων <WG40> hagiōn saints .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ᾄδουσιν <WG103> adousin they sang ᾠδὴν <WG5603> ōdēn song καινὴν <WG2537> kainēn a new λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes - : Ἄξιος <WG514> Axios “ Worthy εἶ <WG1510> ei are You λαβεῖν <WG2983> labein to take τὸ <WG3588> to the βιβλίον <WG975> biblion scroll καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀνοῖξαι <WG455> anoixai open τὰς <WG3588> tas - σφραγῖδας <WG4973> sphragidas seals , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou its ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ἐσφάγης <WG4969> esphagēs You were slain , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἠγόρασας <WG59> ēgorasas You purchased τῷ <WG3588> tō - Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō for God ἐν <WG1722> en by τῷ <WG3588> tō - αἵματί <WG129> haimati blood σου <WG4771> sou Your ἐκ <WG1537> ek [those] from πάσης <WG3956> pasēs every φυλῆς <WG5443> phylēs tribe καὶ <WG2532> kai and γλώσσης <WG1100> glōssēs tongue καὶ <WG2532> kai and λαοῦ <WG2992> laou people καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔθνους <WG1484> ethnous nation .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐποίησας <WG4160> epoiēsas You have made αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous them to be τῷ <WG3588> tō to [ serve ] Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God , ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our βασιλείαν <WG932> basileian a kingdom καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἱερεῖς <WG2409> hiereis priests καὶ <WG2532> kai and βασιλεύσουσιν <WG936> basileusousin they will reign ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi upon ( Or they will reign over; WH they reign upon) τῆς <WG3588> tēs the γῆς <WG1093> gēs earth . ”

( The Lamb Exalted) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then εἶδον <WG3708> eidon I looked , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἤκουσα <WG191> ēkousa I heard φωνὴν <WG5456> phōnēn [the] voices ἀγγέλων <WG32> angelōn angels πολλῶν <WG4183> pollōn of many κύκλῳ <WG2945> kyklō encircling τοῦ <WG3588> tou the θρόνου <WG2362> thronou throne , καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ζῴων <WG2226> zōōn living creatures καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῶν <WG3588> tōn - πρεσβυτέρων <WG4245> presbyterōn elders καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἦν <WG1510> ēn was ὁ <WG3588> ho - ἀριθμὸς <WG706> arithmos number αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their μυριάδες <WG3461> myriades myriads μυριάδων <WG3461> myriadōn of myriads καὶ <WG2532> kai and χιλιάδες <WG5505> chiliades thousands χιλιάδων <WG5505> chiliadōn of thousands .

λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes they were saying : φωνῇ <WG5456> phōnē In a loud voice μεγάλῃ <WG3173> megalē . . . Ἄξιόν* <WG514> Axion “ Worthy ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is τὸ <WG3588> to the Ἀρνίον <WG721> Arnion Lamb , τὸ <WG3588> to who ἐσφαγμένον <WG4969> esphagmenon was slain , λαβεῖν <WG2983> labein to receive τὴν <WG3588> tēn - δύναμιν <WG1411> dynamin power καὶ <WG2532> kai and πλοῦτον <WG4149> plouton riches καὶ <WG2532> kai and σοφίαν <WG4678> sophian wisdom καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἰσχὺν <WG2479> ischyn strength καὶ <WG2532> kai and τιμὴν <WG5092> timēn honor καὶ <WG2532> kai and δόξαν <WG1391> doxan glory καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὐλογίαν <WG2129> eulogian blessing ! ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And πᾶν <WG3956> pan every κτίσμα <WG2938> ktisma creature ὃ <WG3739> ho - ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - οὐρανῷ <WG3772> ouranō heaven καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τῆς <WG3588> tēs - γῆς <WG1093> gēs earth καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὑποκάτω <WG5270> hypokatō under τῆς <WG3588> tēs the γῆς <WG1093> gēs earth καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi in τῆς <WG3588> tēs the θαλάσσης <WG2281> thalassēs sea , 〈ἐστίν〉 <WG1510> estin - καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta that [is] ἐν <WG1722> en in αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them , πάντα <WG3956> panta all ἤκουσα <WG191> ēkousa I heard λέγοντας <WG3004> legontas saying : Τῷ <WG3588> Tō “ To Him who καθημένῳ <WG2521> kathēmenō sits ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τῷ <WG3588> tō the θρόνῳ <WG2362> thronō throne καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῷ <WG3588> tō to the Ἀρνίῳ <WG721> Arniō Lamb ἡ <WG3588> hē be εὐλογία <WG2129> eulogia praise καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡ <WG3588> hē - τιμὴ <WG5092> timē honor καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡ <WG3588> hē - δόξα <WG1391> doxa glory καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὸ <WG3588> to - κράτος <WG2904> kratos power εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv τοὺς <WG3588> tous vvv αἰῶνας <WG165> aiōnas forever τῶν <WG3588> tōn [and] αἰώνων <WG165> aiōnōn ever ! ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And τὰ <WG3588> ta the τέσσαρα <WG5064> tessara four ζῷα <WG2226> zōa living creatures ἔλεγον <WG2036> elegon said , Ἀμήν <WG281> Amēn “ Amen , ” καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi the πρεσβύτεροι <WG4245> presbyteroi elders ἔπεσαν <WG4098> epesan fell down καὶ <WG2532> kai and προσεκύνησαν <WG4352> prosekynēsan worshiped . ( TR includes Him who lives for ever and ever.)
